author: rfnome
title: Value at a budget price
text:
The location is perfect for anyone using either King's Cross or St. Pancras International and/or The London Underground for airport access. Whether Gatwick or Heathrow. The rooms are quite well organized though "cookie cutter" as are most hotels in the chain. The breakfasts, both continental and full, are very good values and well done. A good night sleep at a moderate price, secure, generally nice staff. Evening int he restaurant not so much but not at all bad. Just not up to the excellence I've experienced at Premier Inn facilities in smaller cities. Plenty of dining alternatives in easy walking distance. There are other properties in the area at somewhat lower cost but the quality of this Premier Inn makes the slightly higher price a best value.
Beware the automated check-in, though and press a bit for a proper desk clerk to get it right.
